text:
Cruncher | San Francisco, CA | ONSITE

We're an early-stage startup applying artificial intelligence to text data for the financial industry. We would like to fill two full-time roles: a frontend web developer and a backend systems administrator. Past experience with and knowledge of ElasticSearch, MySQL, Node.js, and Python are all major pluses.

If you're interested, send me an email at dylan.rhodes@crunchertechnologies.com - we'd be happy to answer any questions or explain what we're working on in more depth over coffee.
